title: The Writer's Almanac -Wednesday, November 13, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Robert Louis Stevenson (1850), whose novel “Treasure Island” was based on a game he invented to entertain his stepson.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Robert Louis Stevenson (1850), whose novel “Treasure Island” was based on a game he invented to entertain his stepson.
